thread.title: Laptop Containing Clinton Email Probe Stolen From Secret Service Agent’s Car
thread.title_full: Laptop Containing Clinton Email Probe Stolen From Secret Service Agent’s Car

author: Charles Campbell
title: Laptop Containing Clinton Email Probe Stolen From Secret Service Agent’s Car
text:
GOP Congressman: Trump Should Apologize To Obama For Wiretapping Claim 
The agent told investigators the information on the computer could compromise national security. 
According to the report, the thief stepped out of a car on a street in the Bath Beach neighborhood in Brooklyn and stole the laptop from the agent’s vehicle, which was parked by her home. 
The suspect was caught on a surveillance video walking away from the scene with a backpack. Advertisement - story continues below 
The Secret Service released a statement saying “an employee was the victim of a criminal act in which our Agency issued laptop was stolen.” 
The agency added that its computers “contain multiple layers of security including full disk encryption and are not permitted to contain classified information.” 
Law enforcement sources told NBC News the computer wipes itself clean after multiple unsuccessful login attempts. 
The NYPD, who is assisting in the investigation, said the Secret Service is frantic to find the laptop. Advertisement - story continues below
